CustomField.description: Created 12/2017 to capture Start Price as passed over from Zilliant in the GetPrice call on a Quote. To be shown on the QLI table, Additional Details, and Fetch P&A table. Value always comes from Zilliant but will be overwritten in our code to = 0 if the Shipment_Method__c on the Quote is Direct.
CustomField.label: Start Price
